front.title: IEEE 802.1X Remote Authentication Dial In User Service (RADIUS) Usage Guidelines

abstract.t: This document provides suggestions on Remote Authentication Dial In User Service (RADIUS) usage by IEEE 802.1X Authenticators. The material in this document is also included within a non-normative Appendix within the IEEE 802.1X specification, and is being presented as an IETF RFC for informational purposes. This memo provides information for the Internet community.
